title: Harry Styles sends fans into meltdown with cryptic tweet after five months away
text:
‘Don’t you mean “go and stream #NiceToMeetYa by Niall Horan”?’ another wrote, unable to resist a plug.

‘Is Do even a person? Is Do an emotion? Is she a place? We don’t know,’ one more bemused fan pointed out.

Meanwhile, eagle-eyed are questioning if the star is spelling out song titles or lyrics, potentially teasing his second solo album.

After the success of his self-titled debut album (which produced bangers like Sign Of The Times and Sweet Creature) the world is definitely ready for more Styles.

No one is okay (Pictures: Twitter)

The 25-year-old has been working on his new album for around a year, revealing in November last year that it was coming.

The former One Direction star said: ‘I’m making my second album right now, so I’m going to do that [make the right choices], read a lot and see what happens.’

And he’s since been teasing it, with Stevie Nicks previously telling The Face magazine that the new record is ‘not like his last album’.

The world is ready for more Styles (Picture: WireImage)

‘It’s not like anything One Direction ever did. It’s pure Harry, as Harry would say. He’s made a very different record and it’s spectacular,’ she said.

Harry added: ‘I’m not always super-outspoken. But I think it’s very clear from choices that I make that I feel a certain way about lots of things.

‘I don’t know how to describe it. I guess I’m not… I want everyone to feel welcome at shows and online. They want to be loved and equal, you know?

‘I’m never unsupported, so it feels weird for me to overthink it for someone else.’

We have no choice but to stan.

description: Harry Styles shares cryptic tweet after five months away which makes fans think new album is coming soon.
